surplusParticipationPremiumRate.description: Surplus participation premium share in percentage. Set as part of the offer and omitted during request.

surplusParticipationRate.description: Surplus participation profit share in percentage. Set as part of the offer and omitted during request.

surplusParticipationPeriodYears.description: Duration of the surplus period in years. Set as part of the offer and omitted during request.
